message.name: ERR_BDM_RFR_APPEAL_CASE_CLOSED
message.locale: A new Issue cannot be created since the Appeal Case is Closed.

message.name: ERR_BDM_RFR_ISSUE_NOT_ACTIVE
message.locale: Issue Decision can be recorded only when Issue Status is Active.

message.name: ERR_BDM_RFR_ISSUE_ITEM_NOT_APPROVED
message.locale: Issue Decision can be recorded only when Item Under Appeal is Approved.

message.name: ERR_BDM_RFR_ISSUE_NOT_ACTIVE_CANNOT_APPROVE
message.locale: There is no Active Issue for this Appeal. This Item cannot be approved.

message.name: ERR_BDM_RFR_ISSUE_RESOLUTION
message.locale: Resolution can be recorded only when all the Issues are completed.

message.name: ERR_BDM_RFR_ISSUE_DECISION_PENDING
message.locale: Issue cannot be completed since Issue Decision is not recorded.

message.name: ERR_BDM_RFR_ISSUE_CANCELLED_CANNOT_COMPLETED
message.locale: Issue cannot be completed since it is cancelled.
